name: Edwin Lee
goal: My background is in programming, mechanical engineering, building energy modeling, and numerical analysis.  My passion is in using my skills to do good for the world.  These come together working at the National Renewable Energy Laboratory where I use my skills to support the Department of Energy and my coworkers through development of EnergyPlus and supporting other projects.  My goal is to combine my skills and my passion, no matter what project I am working on.
